ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] selling D2 acct. hoooow?
ygData.msgSnippet: To fear mobs, get mask of horror, look very cool when wore too.  I used to own one by lost when trying to do solo transfer ;( Me still at lvl 76, long time no
ygData.messageBody:
To fear mobs, get mask of horror, look very cool when wore too. I used to own one by lost when trying to do solo transfer ;(

Me still at lvl 76, long time no play liao ;)


On Friday, 06 October, 2000 5:28 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...] wrote:
> Heheh. U read correctly. i meant LIFE not AC.
> My barb life is over 1000+ now :)
> That guy is 2000 over ar.life
> My AC almost hit 3000 with a 800+ ornate with all the str items in. Th elast
> time u gave me your ornate 600+ my ac alreadi 2000 + , rememeber?
> thats why i can wear iceblink without big prob. lotsa teen barbs try
> Iceblink and die like siao.many complain and said iceblink sux.becos all
> they do it throw pts into strength.
>
> Wah kow, got such a helm that blinds mobs?? must get it b4 it gets too
> popular.
>
> On my shoopping list is a Pike with 180+ dmg and an item at can make mobs
> flee. With frezze and flee, i can lower my def with more resist and +skill
> items.
>
> Btw, i followed your advice. ww=20, pike mastery=20. with +skills i can hit
> 23 with this two, enchancing my critical hit.
>
> I just saw at Ebay someone selling his 84th barb for USD$350, no one is
> bidding for it :P
>
> what syour barb lvl now?
>
> bibi
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: LKW <kw.lee@...>
> To: <sg-everquest@egroups.com>
> Sent: Friday, October 06, 2000 4:56 PM
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] selling D2 acct. hoooow?
>
>
> > Wait, 2000+ life? Mine only 500-600 leh. U mean ac or life???
> >
> > Maybe u can also consider that unique helm tat blind ya target, forget
> name
> > liao. For all the mobs u WW hit, they will be blinded for few seconds, ie
> > they won't attack or run away like flee, yet when u kill them u get the
> > corpses ;)
> >
> > Mine is half resis, half skin, half spear, half bash (wasted, shld have
> > hold on a little bit longer and throw to spear mastery) max ww, now I'm
> > maxing my leap attack for pvp. My ornate only 789 ac but I need its
> resis.
> > I can solo in a 8 men hell 4 except last zone coz I dun wanna kill diablo
> > for the baron title. Maybe I need to do it so as to sell my acct for
> > better price, hehe.
> >
> >
> > On Friday, 06 October, 2000 4:44 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
> > wrote:
> > > Think ebay down for server updates. :P
> > >
> > > Iceblink is good if life(Hp ) is high. , Attack rating is good, damage
> > is
> > > good. My barb Life is now 1000+ . I learn from an old bard, he has got
> 3
> > > barbs char into the 80+ lvl, each specalizing in diff weapons. His
> stats
> > > are mainly : max-mastery, max-ww, half max skin, half max- nat resist.
> > max
> > > speed. half max- leap att. His barb life is over 2000+ with rings and
> > stuff
> > > . adding life items a must have.
> > > The type of make up is good PKing, Run faster than a Amazon, Leap attack
> > a
> > > Pald, necro, anything. sure win.
> > >
> > > Iceblink is nice to play when i know the type of enemies im facing. in
> > Act
> > > 4, I Frezze the mobs and hit them 3-4 times in a 5 player game and they
> > r
> > > down (one each). the down side is only cannot use find potion. all turn
> > to
> > > water liao..Hahahha
> > > In a solo or 2 players game, Can freeze and bring down a mob with one
> > > hit.max 2 hit.
> > > When im swarmed with mobs. gotta use the sun-tze method. : Divide and
> > > conquer. Run and some mobs follows , kill those that follows and WW
> > backward
> > > to the spot. with high speed skill, np.
> > > Most mobs in hell act 4 is lvl 74 -80, so percenatge to hit pretty good.
> > >
> > > Main problem is with named, especally the River of Flame, that "armoroer
> > > hits hard. that one needs to change back to Ornate.other named, Iceblink
> > > freeze cant ever hold for 1 sec :P
> > >
> > > Since i lost that 800+ ornate , now only git a 600+ one. no prawn, fish
> > also
> > > good ah.
> > > Iceblink only 95 def ar !!!!!
> > > Your helm is good, i gotta get a dmg -mana type boots or helm. good
> idea.
> > >
> > > regards
> > > Bibi

> hrs
> > a
> > > > day,
> > > > > > > > kinda difficult to do big things in EQ (imagine the time spend
> > on
> > > > > > > > "taxi-ing" everyone just to gather for plane raids). I'm
> > looking
> > > > > forward

> > development
> > > > team
> > > > > > > > giving them feedback and comments (based on my experience with
> > UO,
> > > > EQ,
> > > > > and
> > > > > > > > D2).
> > > > > > > >

> > > > > RPG,
> > > > > > > > u can check this out at:

> > > very
> > > > > cool.
> > > > > > > > Imagine 15 races (more than EQ, including vampire, demon,
> > angel
> > > > and
> > > > > > > > dragon!!), skill-based (versatile like UO, so u dun get caught
> > in
> > > a
> > > > > > > > specific class when it's nerfed, hehe), 4 times land size of
> > EQ,
> > > > real
> > > > > 3D
> > > > > > > > (ie adventure in land, sea and air!!! Not just swiming in EQ
> > but
> > > > the
> > > > > real
> > > > > > > > adventure is also found in sea and air!!!), etc etc. Beta out
> > Q1
> > > > > 2001.
> > > > > > > >

> > massive
> > > > > online
> > > > > > > > RPG. Subscribe to the mailing list for more local news and we
> > will
> > > > all
> > > > > go
> > > > > > > > to the same server this time ;)
> > > > > > > >
> > > > > > > > EQ need to come out with more features (and less frustration).
> > > The
> > > > > new UO
> > > > > > > > development team has already improve UO by alot (not just
> > adding
> > > > more
> > > > > > > mobs,
> > > > > > > > quests or exploring land). With so many new massive online
> > coming
> > > > up,
> > > > > the
> > > > > > > > exisitng one must buck up in order to retain their customers.
